description: Take roasted asparagus to the next level with a crunchy pangrattato (Italian-style breadcrumbs). This delectable side will jazz up any meal.
name: Roasted Asparagus With Hazelnut Pangrattato Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer asparagus to a serving plate and serve drizzled with pan juices and scattered with 1 cup pangrattato.
